name: Sudoku Brain Master
description:
Sudoku Brain Master is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9x9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3x3 sub-grids that compose the grid contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.

FEATURES:
- different difficulties
- hundreds of puzzles for each difficulty
- auto pencil mark (draft)
- hint system
